# Unconditional sequence

```{mermaid}
flowchart TB
  st1[statement 1] --> st2[statement 2] --> st3[statement 3] --> etc.  
```

```{r}
a <- 123
b <- a * 2
print(a)
print(b / b)
```

# Compound statement

```{mermaid}

```


```{r}

a <- 123
b <- a * 2
print(a)
print(b / b)
```

# Conditional sequence

```{mermaid}
flowchart TB
  st1[statement 1] --> st2{condition} --TRUE--> st3[statement 3]
  st2 --FALSE--> st4[statement 4]
  st3 --> st4
```

```{r}
a <- 123
if (a > 0) {
  print("'a' is positive")
}
print(a * a)
```

```{mermaid}
flowchart TB
  st1[statement 1] --> st2{condition} --TRUE--> st3a[statement 3a]
  st2 --FALSE--> st3b[statement 3b]
  st3a --> st4[statement 4]
  st3b --> st4
```

```{r}
a <- 123
if (a >= 0) {
  print("'a' is positive")
} else {
  print("'a' is negative")
}
print(a * a)
```
